# What is an Identity Verification API?

Identity Verification APIs allow businesses to streamline the process of
checking the identities of new users by automatically, and in some cases
instantly, verifying their provided identifying information.

A good identity verification API should allow you to embed the identity
verification process into your onboarding flows and processes, enabling easy
ID and bank account verification, criminal database checks, and more directly
into your product. Using an identity verification API can help prevent fraud
and increase the safety of your business, by ensuring that the users signing
up for your platform are indeed who they claim to be.

Identity verification APIs can be used across a wide variety of industries,
including finance and banking, healthcare, and education, among others. With
an identity verification API businesses can:

  * Capture IDs and extract ID information, including driver’s licenses, passports, etc.
  * Verify authenticity for the information captured from those IDs
  * Match selfies and photos to IDs
  * Validate Social Security numbers (SSNs) and Tax Identification numbers (TINs)
  * Verify phone numbers
  * Use utility, government, and bank login portals to verify an identity
  * Pull credit reports and other banking and financial information

  
Businesses can use a service like Plaid, for example, to help verify new user
identities. When using Modern Treasury, businesses can take advantage of our
partnership with Plaid to easily and quickly verify new users and their
relevant banking information. Learn more about our partnership with Plaid
here.

## Pricing FAQs

What are your transaction fees?

Our pricing structure is primarily based on products and features utilized. We
do not charge per transaction fees nor basis points per transaction.

Do you sit in the flow of funds?

No. Modern Treasury does not hold your funds in our bank accounts or route
transactions by touching your money. When you initiate a payment order, for
instance, we are sending an instruction to your underlying bank partner. We
are an independent software layer built on top of your bank partner.

What kinds of companies use Modern Treasury?

Modern Treasury works with companies from the Fintech 50 list to Fortune 500:

  *  **Fast-growing startups:** Our bank payments and ledgering APIs are used by startups to launch products that move money, from lending to digital wallets to programmatic payouts.
  *  **Large complex enterprises:** Our reconciliation engine, robust controls, and bank network remove the pain of dealing with multiple rails, banks, and payment processes.

If you are facing complexities in money movement, be it because money is a
core part of your product or service or because of your size, we can help. For
more information on how we work with customers, you can review our case
studies here.

What if my payment needs have changed after a contract is closed?

We are happy to work with you to ensure pricing reflects your current needs.

How does customer support work at Modern Treasury?

Payments are complex and hard to navigate. For that reason, quality in
customer service is core to the work we do. Customers are assigned a customer
success manager to handle go-live and day-to-day needs. We also offer optional
professional implementation services for a customers with complex use cases.
